com.facebook.litho

Class ViewCompatComponent<V extends View>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.ComponentLifecycle
      • com.facebook.litho.ViewCompatComponent<V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventDispatcher

    public class ViewCompatComponent<V extends View>
extends ComponentLifecycle
    A component that can wrap a view using a ViewCompatComponent.ViewBinder class to bind the view and a ViewCompatCreator to create the mount contents. This component will have a different recycle pool per ViewCompatCreator.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ViewCompatComponent.Builder<V extends View> 
      static interface  ViewCompatComponent.ViewBinder<V extends View>
      Binds data to a view.
